transcript.text: well shabbat shalom i'm in my little
suka tonight deep in the oregonian
wilderness somewhere west of portland
with a group of other<font color="#CCCCCC"> hebrew</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> roots</font>
messianic believers this is the opening
<font color="#E5E5E5">night of Sukkot it's the night of</font>
September 27th solve the blood mood as
it rose over the oregonian wilderness
tonight and had a beautiful opening
<font color="#E5E5E5">thanksgiving meal with all the fixings</font>
turkey and gravy and mashed<font color="#CCCCCC"> potatoes and</font>
<font color="#E5E5E5">cranberry sauce anyway</font><font color="#CCCCCC"> it's been a quite</font>
an eventful late<font color="#CCCCCC"> afternoon and evening</font>
as we've been<font color="#E5E5E5"> celebrating the opening</font>
night of this<font color="#CCCCCC"> 8th day feast of Sukkot</font>
and I just wanted<font color="#CCCCCC"> to wish everyone a</font>
very happy feast and hopefully tomorrow
<font color="#CCCCCC">I'll be able</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> to actually record what the</font>
main meeting hall looks like and it's
very elegant they've the people who put
this on really went all out I mean it
<font color="#E5E5E5">looks elegant and enchanting and</font>
beautiful and i really<font color="#CCCCCC"> want to</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> record it</font>
at night so i'll try to record it
tomorrow<font color="#CCCCCC"> night when it's all lit up</font>
anyway shabbat shalom to everyone out
there grabbing wonderful Sukkot
